'''Carp Spirit Orb''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained by completing [[Jade Cascade]] puzzles in [[Mt. Xuanlian]].

A total of three can be found and are used during the {{Quest|An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade}}.
